events.message: We have received your application for the Software Engineer role and appreciate your interest in joining our team.
Your application has been reviewed and categorized under the Engineering cluster based on your skills and experience in software development.
A recruiter has been assigned to your candidacy and will be your point of contact moving forward during this recruitment process.
The initial screening interview was conducted to assess your technical skills and fit for the Software Engineer position.
We have received your prompt response confirming your availability for the upcoming interview rounds and appreciate your enthusiasm.
Your technical interview is scheduled for June 10th at 2 PM UTC, where you will meet with our senior engineers to discuss your coding skills.
You successfully completed the technical interview demonstrating strong problem-solving abilities and a solid understanding of software engineering principles.
Your HR interview is scheduled for June 14th at 10 AM UTC to discuss your cultural fit and employment terms.
The HR interview went well, and we discussed your career aspirations, benefits, and company culture alignment.
An offer has been extended to you for the Software Engineer role including salary, benefits, and other relevant details.
We received your feedback positively accepting the terms and indicating your excitement about joining our engineering team.
You have officially accepted the job offer, and we are excited to welcome you aboard as a new Software Engineer.
Your onboarding process has begun with access to our internal tools, documentation, and introduction to your team.
The hiring process is now officially closed. We successfully hired you for the Software Engineer position and look forward to your contributions.
